Name: Will Teixeira da Silva
Description:
The victim was a sex worker murdered in the street.

Folha de Pernambuco, 02.02.2009

Name: Noor Azlan Khamis
Description:
Noor worked as a manager in a furniture store. She was found lying on the sofa in a pool of blood in her apartment in Taman Molek, a residential and industrial area located on the northern edge of Johor Bahru.

> Noor Azlan Khamis, 29 years old and warehouse manager in a furniture store, was on Sunday, February 1, 2009 between the hours. 04 and 07 killed by stab in [her] apartment at Taman Molek, a residential and industrial area located on the northern edge of Johor Bahru north of Singapore in Malaysia. Khamis lived alone in the apartment. 
> 
> Khamis was a [trans woman] and had been at a karaoke bar, which [she] left at three on the night of Sunday. 
> 
> During the evening - by the time of 1830 - on Sunday [she] did not answer when one of [her] friends called. The friend who lived nearby went over to [her] apartment, but there was no answer when [they] knocked on the entrance door. The friend therefore looked through a window and saw Khamis lying on a sofa.
> 
> The friend became nervous that there was something seriously wrong and knocked hard again on the entrance door without result. When [they] got in the door, it wasn't locked. [They] came into the apartment and found Khamis lying in a pool of blood. [They] immediately alerted the police.

New Strait Times, 03.02.2009 & Yuki-Shock-Blog

http://www.transviden.dk/noor-azlan-khamis-draebt-20060201/

https://yukishock.blogspot.com/2009/02/transgender-woman-found-dead-with-neck_59.html

Name: Cristy
Description:
Cristy was stabbed 30 times.

Source: http://trans.ilga.org/ and www.liminalis.org

Name: Camila Pereira
Description:
Camilla was stabbed and died in the hospital 2 days later.

Name: Puttalakshmi’s (Hijra)
Description:
Puttalakshmi’s was Hijra. She was raped and thrown out of a moving vehicle.

Source: www.liminalis.org and Bangalore News, 19.02.2009

Name: Cris Francisco das Neves
Description:
Cris died in the street from a head wound.

Source: www.liminalis.org and Tribuna Popular, 20.02.2009

Name: Vicky Londoño Chavarría
Description:
Vicky was found dead in a client's apartment. She had been stabbed to death.

Source: www.liminalis.org and El Nuevo Dia, 22.02.2009

Name: Pequeña P
Description:
Pequeña a performer and was found strangled in her apartment. Although suicide was initially suspected, that changed after an autopsy revealed she had been strangled.

Source: www.liminalis.org and La Razon, 03.04.2009
